snippet: Isaiah Thomas scored 16 of his 22 points in the third quarter Wednesday, when the Boston Celtics turned a 3-point deficit into a 16-point lead before coasting to their 14th straight home victory, a 116-96 win over the Memphis Grizzlies.
abstract: Boston Celtics beat Memphis Grizzlies, 116-96; other pro basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas scored 16 of his 22 points in the third quarter Wednesday, when the Boston Celtics turned a 3-point deficit into a 16-point lead before coasting to their 14th straight home victory, a 116-96 win over the Memphis Grizzlies.
